price: অথচ সন্তান গ্ৰহণ কৰা ৰহমানৰ বাবে শোভনীয় নহয়।
arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yanbaghī lilrraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladan
